thread.title: Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann has "no intention" of leaving Atletico Madrid this summer
thread.title_full: Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann has "no intention" of leaving Atletico Madrid this summer

author: Liam Prenderville
title: Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann has "no intention" of leaving Atletico Madrid this summer
text:
Sport Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann has "no intention" of leaving Atletico Madrid this summer The Frenchman has been heavily linked with a move to Old Trafford but doesn't plan to leave Atletico this summer Share Antoine Griezmann celebrates a belter of a free-kick against Sevilla (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Share Get Manchester United FC     
Antoine Griezmann has confirmed he will not be leaving Atletico Madrid this summer. 
The Frenchman has been heavily linked with a move to Manchester United as Jose Mourinho prepares to splash the cash again. 
With Wayne Rooney expected to depart, Griezmann has been tipped to be the marquee arrival this summer. 
But the forward has played down the chances of moving away from the Spanish capital. 
"I have no intention of leaving Atletico Madrid, for Paris Saint-Germain, China, the USA, Russia, or elsewhere," he told L'Equipe. The forward is having another fine season (Photo: Bongarts/Getty Images) Mourinho is said to be keen on Griezmann (Photo: REUTERS) 
Asked specifically about a possible move to Barcelona or Real Madrid, he added: "That's the dream for every player; to be at big clubs like that, or Bayern Munich. 
"But right now I don't see myself at Barcelona or Real, or anywhere else. I'm happy in Spain." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
